forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the morning...overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain likely. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
